fields.headline: The week that was
fields.bodyText: Monday Discrimination emerges in WoW? US games sales up in 2005... but also down Finally uninstalled Tuesday Sex in games conference announced Reasons to be cheerful Can the games industry address an ageing population? The Movies at Sundance Wednesday More PS3 release doubts Do computer games promote active minds? Nintendo questions Thursday PS3: the first six *confirmed* games Technology UK teachers are gung-ho about games in education Friday Ten most interesting people in gaming - international perspective Wow The coolest non-player characters of all time
